SELECT '0' AS CHK , '' AS ROWFLAG , A.INF_ID AS REF_ID , A.REQ_ID , B.REQ_NO , B.REQ_NAME , A.PJT_ID , A.REG_STIME , A.REG_USER_ID , A.REG_USER_NM , A.REG_USER_DEPT
FROM PJ_INF_REQ_MAP A , PJ_REQMENT B
WHERE 1 = 1 AND A.PJT_ID = B.PJT_ID AND A.REQ_ID = B.REQ_ID AND A.INF_ID = #{INF_ID}
ORDER BY B.REQ_NO, B.REQ_ID
